question: What are the key components of the Hugging Face ecosystem?
response: The Hugging Face ecosystem is a comprehensive suite of tools and resources for NLP practitioners, revolving around the Hugging Face Hub, accessible at [https://huggingface.co/](https://huggingface.co/). The Hub provides access to pre-trained models, datasets, Spaces for showcasing interactive demos, and educational resources, found at [https://github.com/huggingface/education-toolkit](https://github.com/huggingface/education-toolkit). Key open-source libraries include `datasets`, which simplifies downloading and managing datasets with features like streaming; `transformers`, which provides building blocks for working with transformer models and supports PyTorch and TensorFlow; and `evaluate`, which facilitates the computation of evaluation metrics.
